text: aur jin logon ne eemaan qubool kiya aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie unhen ham anaqareeb hee (behisht ke) un (hare bhare) baagon mein ja pahunchaegen jinake (darakhton ke) neeche naharen jaaree hongee aur ye log usamen hamesha aabaadul aabaad tak rahenge (ye unase) khuda ka pakka vaayada hai aur khuda se jyaada (apanee) baat mein sachcha kaun hoga
